Class WeatherForecast

    public class WeatherForecast
extends OpenWeatherMapApi
    Weather Forecast from openweathermap.org example: https://samples.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/forecast?id=524901&appid=b6907d289e10d714a6e88b30761fae22

    wf
